title: SAMSUNG 212 L Direct Cool Single Door 3 Star Refrigerator  (Elegant Inox, RR22M272ZS8/NL)

product_specification.In The Box:
1 Refrigerator
User Manual and Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: 5 Door Pockets, 1 Vegetable and Fruit Drawer, 2 Egg Containers
product_specification.Other Features: Net Capacity for Fridge: 185 L, Net Capacity for Freezer: 18 L, Fresh Room (Chilled): Yes, Freshmax: Big Guard, Door Type: Grande Door
product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years Warranty on Compressor from Samsung
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty:
Any accessories external to the product
Defects caused by improper use as determined by the company personnel
Serial number is removed, altered or obliterated from the machine
Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube
Site (where the premises is kept) conditions that do not confirm to the recommended operating conditions of the machine
Product is not used according to the instructions given in the instructions manual
Modification or alteration of any nature made in the electrical circuitry or physical construction of the set
Defects due to cause beyond control like lightening, abnormal voltage, acts of god or while in transit to the service centers or purchasers residence.

product_description.Digital Inverter Compressor: Equipped with a digital inverter compressor, this refrigeration ensures a glitch-free performance and is energy efficient.

review: The great grand hi-tech looking, very good working. Per year 198 units power consumption. Even though it is 3 star, rating but due to digital compressor technology , it will save more power and money. One of the best model. Reasonable price.very good delivery to my second floor. And return pickup of my old Godrej refrigerator. Good deal

nice product as per need first i was considering about 192L but then i somehow purchased this Samsung refrigerator and thus this upto the mark. best fridge under my budget. just a bit noise but cooling is perfect so far. design is superior interior is perfect for vegs fruit and bottles. thanks Flipkart and Samsung
Super design loved it, heating on side walls that's little disappointing but it's mentioned on Manual that's not a big problem... Cooling is very fast and overall I Loved it... Go for it ...

First of all it's been one month I am using this fridge and I am very happy with the product.. Flipkart ultra fast delivery I booked the fridge at 1am and it was delivered to me at around 7.30 pm... Regarding the product there is no complain it has ample space to store vegetables and other foods.
I'm happy with delivery master but not happy with Samsung company bcoz they can't send a service engineer for installation when I got a number of that service engineer they behaved rudely.....

Grand Look , Nice Colour , Very spacious , Fast cooling , in-built inverter and in-built stabilizer are additional features.
Very Very Less sound , side heating also very less not that much high heat.
This product you can go with Samsung without thinning much.

Go for the lg one with the same description its better than this one material quality is not satisfactory and have to empty water form the back every week so it's very irritating not worth better spend some more money and buy another lg one in this section
it's good but performance is not so good.. could be better..I think the models available in Flipkart is not available at market...and little bit quality compromised for rate cutting...my thinking...

I bought this on big billion days for an amount of Rs. 11,500/-. it is a very descent machine with a reasonable cost. performance wise good and looking very descent, shiny and cool. I like this a lot. overall a very good purchase experience with flipkart and Samsung.

Smartly designed with attractive silver grey colour makes this stylish. Nice built quality, specious with easy controlling systems. Stabilizer free with digital inverter compressor energy efficient refrigerator. Best for small size kitchen and small family. Value for money and best buy for me...

Samsung refrigerators are good built wise. But Yes not as great as Liebher. I have bought two Samsung refrigerators in a year. One for my house in Bangalore which is double door type and another this Single door for my native place. I'm a Vegetarian and don't stock any drinks at home. For my usage from our family point of view, this type and size of single door refrigerator is highly suitable. I somewhere regret buying double door as I'm unable to utilize it to large extent. I recommend buying this refrigerator for multiple reasons as below.

1) Back side covered, so doesn't look odd if you need keep the fridge around a living area.
2) Storage : Optimal, for similar lifestyle like mine and with count up to 4-6 ppl.
3) Although being single door, the space availability for regular food stocking is more than in my double storage option which is 235 litres and mostly wasted on top door which I use very less.
4) Largely good built quality.
5) Elegant look, I preferred plain grey self design. I think floral printed is also available.
6 ) Using this since few months now, no much issues. So reliability as such presently assured by Brand name.
Thanks to flipkart for fast & good product for me, the Samsung 212 l fridge is very fantastic working, noise less , fast cooling , I love it
very good product by samsung . nice look. nice work. fast delivery by flipcart. customer care is also impressive of flipcart.

the outer body is good but the plastic quality of internal components is not so good .....the plastic looks cheap and not so tough....also the fridge is very lightweight.
performance of cooling is very good and the capacity is adequate for 4-5 people
the water discharge box is not easily removable
well found the product good , don't know much about the service , but the product works well . the temperature can be adjusted according to the seasons. I loved the rich grey colour, my favourite ...

The product is good and has decent looks. People looking for a single door refrigerator and inverter compressor should consider. One good feature is that unlike conventional refrigerators you can connect it to your inverter power. It uses power of two CFLs as the sticker says.

Excellent product. Good value for my hard earned money. Along with it, Great service from Flipkart. Got the fridge the very next day of order, much before the scheduled. The technician gave nice demo of operations. Long live Flipkart. For every purchase of mine, Flipkart will be the first preference.
Awesome premium quality product, Works well and doesn't produce any sounds, great delivery by Flipkart.

Got the product delivered on time! Value for money,real good discounts from flipkart!
There was no mentioning that there wouldn't be installation from the service provider; Got this info by contacting the customer care. That was not satisfying.
After the usage got to know that the side walls of the refrigerator gets heated up when checked on internet got to know that is normal as the condenser and evaporator are on the side walls... these information if provided in the specifications would help the buyer to make the right choice.
Overall happy with the product and the price was really Good!!

Overall it's a good product. But the size inside is bit small. The compartment are small as per 212L size, the size is like 190L to be true. Bottle keeping compartment is very big that 2.5L bottle can be fit. It's covered from back. No wire is seen from back. It have inbuilt stabilizer. You can go for this product as Flipkart is trust worthy along with good customer service and packing.
